name: Jody
text:
Disappointed. Order 2 personal pan pizzas. 1 was pepperoni- 1 was pepperoni lovers, can you tell the difference???
Pizzas were really bland, tasted like a frozen pizza. …More

name: Adam Sánchez
text: The service was good and the young woman who brought us the pizza was very polite. That being said, the pizza looked like it was sliced during an earthquake with a butter knife.

name: brittany franklin
text: Me and my family got the buffet Tuesday night. It was all old and hard. I asked them if they was gonna put any fresh pizza out. Then we waited 15 minutes and they brought out 1 pizza. So we paid and left.wont do that again.

name: ASHLEY Tyler
text: Love me some pizza

name: Catherine Riddell
text: It was great, we celebrated 3 birthdays in one, and the crew was fantastic, we order 15 large pizzas and they got them fast and hot, they had a mess to clean up, but it was a great day.

name: Jonathan Fuchs
text: Nice variety on buffet. Amazing waitress

name: Enid Albat
text: It's  Pizza Hut. I arrived at the end of the lunch "time". It is the last place in Clarksville that serves any kind of lunch buffet. Due to time they were not replacing anything they ran out of but there was still a reasonable selection of Pizza Hut pizza, pasta, cinnamon sticks and salads. It was clean, fast and great for the price.

name: john davis
text: The Buffett barely had anything on it and what they did have looked as though it had been there awhile. Was there 40 minutes and the salad bar was never filed. The waitress constantly told the customers on how she had been sick the day before and how she should have stayed home. Will never go back.

name: Joe
text: Came in for buffet today. Was told they don’t put chicken or bacon on the buffet anymore bc of cost. So if you like chicken pizza don’t come for the buffet.

name: Sharon Mullins
text:
Today was not as good
as last week. The didnt even bother to bring out any fresh Pizza. I am assuming Pizza had been sating there since 11 when they open up .

name: donny simpson
text: Stephanie is always on the spot with drink refills. They were busy when i was there so the buffet was being emptied and refilled often. Salad was fresh. Food was hot. Service was good and friendly.  What else could a person ask for?
